unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Hours Studied and Exam Scores
question_text: A study was conducted to see if there was a linear relationship between the number of hours studied and exam scores. The following table of values summarizes the data collected: Hours Studied 0 1 2 3 4 Exam Score 50 63 65 81 99 Based on these data, compute a $99\%$ confidence for the slope of the regression line, $β$ .
